{{stub}}
'''Walter Hooper''' was a visitor to [[the Inklings]], holded by [[C.S. Lewis]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and their friends. Walter was invited into a reading meet-up, in which ''[[The Chronicles of Narnia|The Horse and His Boy]]'', ''[[The Two Towers]]'', and other books in progress (at the time) were being written. He is mainly known by his work as literary trustee for C.S. Lewis and [[Owen Barfield]].
{{DEFAULTSORT:Hooper, Walter}}
